urls.title: Trump says he'll ignore key oversight provision in stimulus bill
urls.description: The administration will block a new inspector general from reporting to Congress without "presidential supervision."

text:
Why does Trump have to be so awful?
Sometimes I just feel like crying. https://t.co/ISgheIJuia
